# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

@author: Dominic

from __future__ import division

from random import choice


[docs]class binary(object):
    
    Name = "binary"
    
    def __init__(self,responses = [0,1],threshold = 0.5):
        
        self.responses = responses
        self.threshold = threshold
        

[docs]    def decisionFunc(self, probabilities, beta = None):
        
        if beta == None:
            beta = self.threshold
        
        prob = probabilities[0]

        if abs(prob-0.5)>beta:
            if prob>0.5:
                decision = self.responses[0]
            elif prob == 0.5:
                decision = choice(self.responses)
            else:
                decision = self.responses[1]
        else:
            decision = None
            
        return decision
